title: Angel vs Yohane
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>Yohane-chan! Yohane-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Like-I-said, it’s not Yoshiko…. H        uh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Umm, Yohane-chan…. I’m your ally okay!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Ally….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Setsuna-chan told me, Yohane-chan, you’re being chased by angels right? If you are found out, you’re welcome to hide in my place!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Setsuna…. Still reading that book huh….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s nothing, don’t mind it. I’m alright so don’t worry about me. Did you think that this Yohane-sama would be caught by angels? I’m not trying to hide in the first place. Even if an army of angels came after me, I’ll give them a good taste of Yohane's power, enough to send them back....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>S-, so that’s how it is….! Thank god. I can’t even begin to imagine an Aqours performance without you, Yohane-chan. Setsuna-chan said, “When Yoshiko fights the angels, let’s support her”. When that time comes, I’ll do my best too, okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>….Despite your appearance, you’re quite a dangerous person huh….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
